adHeader: experienced housesitter, & Live-in dogsitter seeks space
adDetails: Experienced Caregiver, dogsitter, pet-sitter with EXCELLENT LOCAL REFERENCES is now available to manage your home while you're away, traveling, vacationing, etc or to care for seniors, elders (trained to deal with alzheimer's or dementia also) and can act as your personal assistant, with driving chores, manage mail etc. Handyman, adept at light housekeeping &/or yard maintenance. Able to watch over your pets while youre away. I have many repeat clients who love my care. Let's discuss your specific needs soon show contact info
